wordGroup: affordable housing 经济适用房；可支付住宅
economically affordable housing 经济适用房

sentences.en: They want their parents to have access to affordable long-term care.
sentences.cn: 他们希望他们的父母可以得到负担得起的长期看护。

sentences.en: Exorbitant housing prices have created an acute shortage of affordable housing for the poor.
sentences.cn: 过高的房价使穷人负担得起的房源严重短缺。

sentences.en: Catherine Young road tests affordable waterproof jackets.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳·杨试穿了一件价格合适的雨衣。
